body_html: There are still two more source of randomness: cudnn nondeterministic algorithms (you can disable them by torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic=True, and dataloader worker scheduling (this currently can only be worked around with num_workers=0 in 0.3, see #4640 for details).
body_text: There are still two more source of randomness: cudnn nondeterministic algorithms (you can disable them by torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic=True, and dataloader worker scheduling (this currently can only be worked around with num_workers=0 in 0.3, see #4640 for details).
body: There are still two more source of randomness: cudnn nondeterministic algorithms (you can disable them by `torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic=True`, and dataloader worker scheduling (this currently can only be worked around with `num_workers=0` in 0.3, see #4640 for details).
